name: Baku Baku Shock

trigger.text: KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with 5000 Power or less.

text: Main / Counter Give up to 1 of your opponent's characters Power -3000 for the turn. Then, give up to 1 of your characters power +3000 for the turn.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your opponent's characters Power -3000 for the turn. Then, give up to 1 of your characters power +3000 for the turn.
KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with 5000 Power or less.
